definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :1Sa 12:21 (Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 112) formlessness, confusion, unreality, emptiness (primary meaning difficult to seize; Vrss usu. Keno/n, ou)de/n, ma/taion, inane, vacuum, vanum; cf. Lag:Or. ii. 60; BN 144);—

formlessness, of primaeval earth Ge 1:2 (P), of land reduced to primaeval chaos Je 4:23 (both + [[וׇבׂהוּ]] and voidness), Is 34:11 ´[[קַו־תַ]]: (‖[[אַבְנֵי בׂהוּ ]]), Is 45:18 [[בְרָאָהּ]] ´[[לאׁ ת]]: (‖[[לָשֶׁבֶת יְחָרָתּ ]]); Is 24:10 ´[[קִרְיַתאתּ]]: city of chaos (of ruined city); = nothingness, empty space, Job 26:7 [[תּׂלֶה אֶרֶץ]] ´[[עַלאתּ]]:; of empty, trackless waste De 32:10 (‖[[מִדְבָּר ]]), Job 6:18, Job 12:24 = Ps 107:40.

fig. of what is empty, unreal, as idols 1Sa 12:21 (coll.: [[אֲשֶׁר]] ´[[אַחֲרֵי הַתּ]]: [[לאׁ יוֹעִילוּ]]), v:1Sa 12:21, Is 41:29 [[נִסְכֵּיהֶם]] ´[[רוּחַ וׇת]]:, Is 44:9 (of idol-makers), groundless arguments or considerations, Is 29:21 [[חַדִּיק]] ´[[וַיַּטּוּ בַתּ]]:, Is 59:4 moral unreality or falsehood ´[[בָּטוֹחַ עַלאתּ]]: (‖[[וְדַבֶּר־שָׁוְא ]]); = a thing of nought (cf. Sir 41:10 [[מתהו אל תהו]]), Is 40:17 (‖[[אַיִן ]], [[אֶפֶס]]), v:Is 40:23 [[עָשָׂה]] ´[[שׁׂפְטֵי אֶרֶץ כַּתּ]]: (‖[[לְאַיִן ]]), worthlessness Is 49:19 [[וְהֶבֶל כּׂ חִי כִלֵּיתִי]] ´[[לְת]]: (‖[[לְרִיק יׇגַעְתִּי ]]); as adv. acc. Is 45:19 I said not, [[תּׂהוּ בַקְּשׁוּנִי]] seek me emptily, to no purpose. Cf. Is 29:13 LXX [[וְתׂהוּ]] for [[וַתְּהִי]].
